summary: When the player is reaches higher levels, Odahviing becomes useless because its weak fire breath and other attacks. this mod make Odahviing to level with the player.
descriptionHtml:
When the player is reaches higher levels, Odahviing becomes useless because its weak fire breath and other attacks. this mod make Odahviing to level with the player.
my problem is that I cannot verify that the mod is working, so if anyone call tell me it will realy help. I am a new modder and its the first mod that I publish (my other mods not good ones)
the mod requires patch 1.5.

optional: I have added a mod the make Odahviing to be 4 times more levels than player. example: if the player is level 50, Odaviing will be level 200. 

Test mod: I noticed that the mod is not working so I worked on a solution and here is the results, its hard to know if this mod realy works so I need your help on this one. I am always here for you guys and the fact that this is my only mod that I have uploaded makes things even easier 

and here a mod that will change your Odahviing, choose your color:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4008&navtag=file/images.php?id=4008&tab=3
author: NCRsoldier
